author: ja_0001
content:
Hi there, I just created this repo as an idea to reunite all (non) basic material,  in order to help any person being able to first understand Verkle Tree and Stateless concepts (including coding). This is just the skeleton, what I need from you, if you are so kind, is to comment anything you feel is missing or any idea to improve it. Thank you so much. 

https://github.com/JEAlfonsoP/Verkle-Tree-and-Stateless-in-Ethereum-101

author: controlcthenv
content: Would you mind maybe moving this over to something like https://github.com/ethereum/verkle-dev-website/ ? There is a WIP website there to hold Verkle information for people, the repo needs some help, but if you could contribute some of what you have so far there that could be helpful

author: ja_0001
content: Thank you. Count on me. I will take a look on it  !
